entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light.

entries.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
entries: As an action, you can distract foes, giving your allies advantage on attacks against enemies within 10 feet of you.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries: You have advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.
